name: Apocalypse Downhill
description:
Made for the 1 Button Game Jam 2019. Escape a breaking world in your board!

Touch to JUMP, double tap to GRAB and hold to GRIND.

It was a really fun experience. We kinda entered the jam late, on monday, but the ideas came very quickly and we made it! The themes of DECAY and SLIDE were used to create this concept, which turned out very fun.

We hope you enjoy it.
